texts: Green coffee beans aren't actually green — they're pale grayish-green; the brown color we associate with coffee only appears after roasting.
Decaf coffee isn't caffeine-free — it still contains 2-15mg per cup, meaning drinking 5-10 cups of decaf gives you the same caffeine as one cup of regular coffee.
The world's most expensive coffee, Kopi Luwak, is made after palm civets eat coffee cherries and excrete the digested beans — collectors then retrieve and clean them.
text: Green coffee beans aren't actually green — they're pale grayish-green; the brown color we associate with coffee only appears after roasting.
